subject: Basketball
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
Trades (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The Knicks could only watch as Utah selected Gordon Hayward with the ninth overall selection — the Knicks’ original pick before the ill-fated Stephon Marbury trade in 2004.
snippet: The Knicks could only watch as Utah selected Gordon Hayward with the ninth overall selection — the Knicks’ original pick before the ill-fated Stephon Marbury trade in 2004.
